topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/545330926368722562600100#post_545330926368722562600100
that was one of the things that hit me. The voice acting is _super bad_. Plus there wasn't nearly enough of it. Korra's combat sounds and little quips just repeat, repeat and repeat. 
The combat definitely has some platinum flavor but it didn't quite have the same oomf. 
Fighting larger enemies was kind of a pain because it barely felt like I was doing anything half the time. 

I'd still take it over god of war. And I like god of war.
